name: Los Angeles Rams at Seattle Seahawks

headlines.description: — Mike Macdonald was in no mood to play for a tie, and the Los Angeles Rams’ defense had no interest in letting Sam Darnold connect with any of his top receiving options.
headlines.shortLinkText: Seahawks overcome 16-point deficit to stun Rams 38-37 in OT in NFC West showdown

name: Philadelphia Eagles at Washington Commanders

headlines.description: — As the percussive horns of Stevie Wonder's “Sir Duke” filled the air, Philadelphia Eagles coach Nick Sirianni — wearing a black T-shirt bearing the words, “Been there, won that” — made the...
headlines.shortLinkText: Jalen Hurts and the Eagles win their second NFC East title in a row by beating the Commanders 29-18

name: Green Bay Packers at Chicago Bears

headlines.description: — Caleb Williams felt it as soon as the ball left his hand. Then, in a flash, the Bears were celebrating yet another wild win.
headlines.shortLinkText: Bears stun Packers 22-16 with improbable rally as Williams finds Moore for winning score in OT

name: Buffalo Bills at Cleveland Browns

highlights.headline: Bills hold off Browns for 4th straight win
highlights.description: The Bills hang on for a 23-20 win over the Browns, improving their win streak to four games.

tracking.trackingName: COM_NFL Highlight (Bills hold off Browns for 4th straight win) 2025/12/21 ESHEET SOTFULL

headlines.description: — James Cook continues to show opposing defenses that they have to factor in more than Josh Allen when facing the Buffalo Bills.
headlines.shortLinkText: Cook's 117-yard, 2-TD performance propels Bills closer to playoff berth with 23-20 win over Browns

video.headline: Bills hold off Browns for 4th straight win

tracking.trackingName: COM_NFL Highlight (Bills hold off Browns for 4th straight win) 2025/12/21 ESHEET SOTFULL

name: Los Angeles Chargers at Dallas Cowboys

highlights.headline: Chargers rout Cowboys on the road
highlights.description: Chargers go on the road and pick up a big 34-17 win over the Cowboys.

tracking.trackingName: COM_NFL Highlight (Chargers rout Cowboys on the road) 2025/12/21 ESHEET

headlines.description: — Justin Herbert is getting more comfortable by the week with his broken left hand that's heavily protected.
headlines.shortLinkText: Justin Herbert keeps Chargers rolling toward playoffs with 34-17 win over Cowboys

video.headline: Chargers rout Cowboys on the road

tracking.trackingName: COM_NFL Highlight (Chargers rout Cowboys on the road) 2025/12/21 ESHEET

name: Kansas City Chiefs at Tennessee Titans

highlights.headline: Cam Ward helps Titans rout the Chiefs
highlights.description: Cam Wards leads the Titans to a 26-9 win over the Chiefs in Week 16.

tracking.trackingName: COM_NFL Highlight (Cam Ward helps Titans rout the Chiefs) 2025/12/21 ESHEET SOTFULL

headlines.description: — The Tennessee Titans spent a few extra minutes celebrating a rare achievement for a franchise struggling through its fourth consecutive losing season.
headlines.shortLinkText: Titans knock Gardner Minshew out of game and end 11-game home skid, beating Chiefs 26-9

video.headline: Cam Ward helps Titans rout the Chiefs

tracking.trackingName: COM_NFL Highlight (Cam Ward helps Titans rout the Chiefs) 2025/12/21 ESHEET SOTFULL

name: Cincinnati Bengals at Miami Dolphins

highlights.headline: Joe Burrow's 4-TD game guides Bengals past Dolphins
highlights.description: The Bengals pick up their fifth win of the season after defeating the Dolphins 45-21.

tracking.trackingName: COM_NFL Highlight (Joe Burrow's 4-TD game guides Bengals past Dolphins) 2025/12/21 ESHEET

headlines.description: — Joe Burrow is having fun playing football.
headlines.shortLinkText: Joe Burrow throws for 309 yards and 4 TDs as Bengals rout Dolphins 45-21

video.headline: Joe Burrow's 4-TD game guides Bengals past Dolphins

name: New York Jets at New Orleans Saints

highlights.headline: Saints win third in a row after taking down the Jets
highlights.description: Saints move to 5-10 on the season with a win over the Jets at home.

tracking.trackingName: COM_NFL Highlight (Saints win third in a row after taking down the Jets) 2025/12/21 ESHEET

headlines.description: — A surprise 38-yard touchdown pass from Taysom Hill to Chris Olave might have deprived New Orleans Saints kicker Charlie Smyth a chance to set a club record in just his fourth career game.
headlines.shortLinkText: Olave's 2 TDs and Smyth's 5 field goals help Saints top Jets 29-6 for a third straight win

video.headline: Saints win third in a row after taking down the Jets

tracking.trackingName: COM_NFL Highlight (Saints win third in a row after taking down the Jets) 2025/12/21 ESHEET

name: Minnesota Vikings at New York Giants

highlights.headline: Vikings edge out Giants for 3rd win in a row
highlights.description: J.J. McCarthy and the Vikings sneak out a 16-13 victory over the Giants in Week 16.

tracking.trackingName: COM_NFL Highlight (Vikings edge out Giants for 3rd win in a row) 2025/12/21 ESHEET SOTFULL

headlines.description: — J.J. McCarthy had already injured his right, throwing hand by the time he ran for a touchdown. Minnesota Vikings coach Kevin O'Connell asked the...
headlines.shortLinkText: J.J. McCarthy gets injured as the Vikings hand the Giants their ninth loss in a row

video.headline: Vikings edge out Giants for 3rd win in a row

name: Tampa Bay Buccaneers at Carolina Panthers

highlights.headline: Panthers take control in NFC South with win over the Bucs
highlights.description: Panthers grab a huge home win over the Buccaneers to take the lead in the NFC South.

tracking.trackingName: COM_NFL Highlight (Panthers take control in NFC South with win over the Bucs) 2025/12/21 ESHEET

headlines.description: — The playoff-starved Carolina Panthers left the locker room Sunday happy, but not yet satisfied.
headlines.shortLinkText: Bryce Young throws 2 TDs, Panthers finally beat Bucs 23-20 to take over first place in NFC South

video.headline: Panthers take control in NFC South with win over the Bucs

name: Jacksonville Jaguars at Denver Broncos

highlights.headline: Lawrence's 4-TD performance leads Jags to big win
highlights.description: Trevor Lawrence accounts for four total touchdowns in the Jaguars' big win over the Broncos on Sunday.

tracking.trackingName: COM_NFL Highlight (Lawrence's 4-TD performance leads Jags to big win) 2025/12/21 ESHEET SOTFULL

headlines.description: — Trevor Lawrence is playing the best ball of his five-year career and now he has a signature win to show for it.
headlines.shortLinkText: Trevor Lawrence's 4 TDs propel Jaguars past Broncos 34-20, ending Denver's 11-game winning streak

headlines.description: — Bijan Robinson had another outstanding game running the ball and catching it, talented tight end Kyle Pitts
headlines.shortLinkText: Bijan Robinson leads Falcons to 2nd straight win, 26-19 over woeful Cardinals

name: Pittsburgh Steelers at Detroit Lions

highlights.headline: Steelers hang on vs. Lions despite late drama
highlights.description: Aaron Rodgers and the Steelers hang on to defeat the Lions 29-24 thanks to a late penalty on Detroit.

tracking.trackingName: COM_NFL Highlight (Steelers hang on vs. Lions despite late drama) 2025/12/21 ESHEET SOTFULL

headlines.description: — The Pittsburgh Steelers survived a wild finish, pushing Detroit to the brink of playoff elimination and boosting their chances of winning their division for the first time in five years.
headlines.shortLinkText: Steelers outlast Lions 29-24 in wild finish when penalty on St. Brown negates Goff's winning TD

video.headline: Steelers hang on vs. Lions despite late drama

headlines.description: — Houston’s struggles Sunday in a victory over the Las Vegas Raiders left some on the Texans top-ranked defense feeling a bit disappointed.

name: New England Patriots at Baltimore Ravens

highlights.description: New England erases an 11-point fourth-quarter deficit to defeat Baltimore and secure a playoff berth.

headlines.description: — Hopefully the rest of the NFL enjoyed the respite.

name: San Francisco 49ers at Indianapolis Colts
